html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-13222024-12-16FIN
ActProceeds of Crime (Money Laundering) and Terrorist Financing Act
SubjectRegulations Amending Certain Regulations Made Under the Proceeds of Crime (Money Laundering) and Terrorist Financing Act
PrecisRegulations amending CERTAIN REGULATIONS MADE UNDER THE PROCEEDS OF CRIME (MONEY LAUNDERING) AND TERRORIST FINANCING ACT in order to (1) require reporting entities to submit to the Financial Transactions and Reports Analysis Centre of Canada (FINTRAC) detailed identifying and transactional information on sanctioned property of entities listed under the Special Economic Measures Act, the Justice for Victims of Corrupt Foreign Officials Act, the United Nations Act and the Criminal Code; and (2) require domestic money service business to submit criminal record checks of their chief executive officer, president, directors, agents and major shareholders to FINTRAC during registration and re-registration (every two years) and retain associated information for five years.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0266 Publication Date: 2025-01-01
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations amending CERTAIN REGULATIONS MADE UNDER THE PROCEEDS OF CRIME (MONEY LAUNDERING) AND TERRORIST FINANCING ACT in order to (1) require reporting entities to submit to the Financial Transactions and Reports Analysis Centre of Canada (FINTRAC) detailed identifying and transactional information on sanctioned property of entities listed under the Special Economic Measures Act, the Justice for Victims of Corrupt Foreign Officials Act, the United Nations Act and the Criminal Code; and (2) require domestic money service business to submit criminal record checks of their chief executive officer, president, directors, agents and major shareholders to FINTRAC during registration and re-registration (every two years) and retain associated information for five years.
